text: ==Belgium== * Belgian Congo – Maurice Lippens, Governor-General of the Belgian Congo (1921–1923) ==France== * French Somaliland – Jules Gérard Auguste Lauret, Governor of French Somaliland (1918–1924) * Guinea – *# Jean Louis Georges Poiret, Lieutenant-Governor of Guinea (1920–1922) *# Jules Vidal, acting Lieutenant-Governor of Guinea (1922) *# Jean Louis Georges Poiret, Lieutenant-Governor of Guinea (1922–1925) ==Japan== * Karafuto – Nagai Kinjirō, Governor-General of Karafuto(17 April 1919 – 11 June 1924) * Korea – Saitō Makoto, Governor-General of Korea (1919–1927) * Taiwan – Den Kenjirō, Governor-General of Taiwan (31 October 1919 – September 1923) ==Portugal== * Angola – João Mendes Ribeiro Norton de Matos, High Commissioner of Angola (1921–1924) * Portuguese Timor – José de Paiva Gomes, Governor (1921–1923) ==United Kingdom== * Malta Colony – Herbert Plumer, Governor of Malta (1919–1924) * Northern Rhodesia – Sir Francis Chaplin, Administrator of Northern Rhodesia (1921–1923) Colonial governors Colonial governors 1922
title: List of colonial governors in 1922
